website_summaries.verdict: Realon’s line of spearfishing wetsuits are optimized for protection from the elements, built to last, and are made from a super-stretchy material for high levels of comfort, making them well worth your consideration.
pros: Available in multiple sizes, medium to XXXL
Available in several colors and thicknesses
Features protective knee and chest pads
cons: These wetsuits are on the pricier side
Only camo color variants are available

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Sweet Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical, but it was a positive surprise! The suit is a little bit sticky rubbery inside (Riffe has the silver reflective surface that is pretty slippery), so don't try to put it on dry. I think getting waxed might feel like it! However you just get yourself wet and it just slides up easy. It is very comfortable (I am 6'2" and 230lbs - XXXL) and I seen a huge improvement with Calicos, I can sneak up on them easy. All over it is a great suit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Attila

customer_reviews.title: Great Price + Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for year-round spearfishing in NW Florida. Have taken it out in low 60 water temps and have been nice and warm the entire time. Make sure to lube the suit up before putting it on each time. The 5mm is also very buoyant, so you'll need at least 8-9 lbs on your weight belt. I read that you should order a size up... I'm 5'10" 165 lbs and got the Large. Fits great.
customer_reviews.author: ozzyjozzy

customer_reviews.title: Its OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's OK but I like the Mako version better. I bought this one because it's what was available and cheap. The large is tight and I get some chafing around my armpits. I'm 5'8" 165 lbs and a large usually has plenty of room but this one is a bit tight. It is warm but not quite as warm as the other spearfishing suit I bought. I dive every day for work so I buy a new suit every year.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good suit. The grass camo suit fits way different
customer_reviews.text: Good suit. The grass camo suit fits way different. More snug. The realon ones have to much material in the armpits. Go for the grass camo. Much better fit
customer_reviews.author: Khristopher S.

customer_reviews.title: A little short for taller guys but its nice and snug and warm
customer_reviews.text: A little short for taller guys but its nice and snug and warm. The little patches on the seems on the inside are falling off but I don't notice any difference or leaking. Nice camo, looks just like the bottom of where I go diving and fishing.
customer_reviews.author: VideoJames

customer_reviews.title: how cold this wetsuit will keep you warm
customer_reviews.text: This wetsuit is one of the most difficult things to get on. I have to go into the shower and put soap over my entire body to slip into it. The 5MM wetsuit keeps me very warm in 35 degree water. It is very durable and stretchy allowing my to paddle into any waves surfing without a issue. For the money this wetsuit is worth every penny. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V Flake

customer_reviews.title: Grass Camo size Large
customer_reviews.text: Just got the suit in... I’m 5’9 about 180 and the Large seems to fit ok. It’s really tight at first and difficult to get on (definitely wet it down) but I think after a few uses it will loosen up and fit nicely. I’m quite muscular so if you’re any bigger than I am I’d definitely recommend that you order a size up I haven’t dived with it yet but the material and feel of the suit is surprisingly nice for the cost. I’m excited to see how it performs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for cold water
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for cold water! I was rock picking in 56 deg water and was sweating! I assume I ordered a few mils thicker than I need. It will make up for it when duck season comes around and Im out in the kayak exposed to lower temps. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: All kids of people said it was open cell but mine was closed cell. It'll work good though
customer_reviews.author: lucas

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my spearfishing obsessed husband. He had ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my spearfishing obsessed husband. He had to buy extra weights to weigh him down so he could dive properly as apparently this suit is very buoyant!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Too much material around the shoulders/armpits for a guy of average build like myself (6' 172lbs) but not uncomfortable. A few small parts of the glued seems have begun to come apart after 5 uses but I'd 100% recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great suit!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit! I'm 6'0 and weigh around 170, large fit perfect. Incredible suit for the cost. Flexible, comfortable, and arrived in perfect condition. About 15+ dives so far.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: ... need some wet suit lube but large was a good fit for 5'10"
customer_reviews.text: Gonna need some wet suit lube but large was a good fit for 5'10" 180lbs
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Great spearfishing wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about fit and sizing with this wetsuit I'm 57 210 pounds stocky build the XL wetsuits fit but the top was a little snug. Xxl may b better fit. The wetsuits good quality great look and the camo pattern is very realistic. The item arrived way sooner than expected and customer service was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Flex

customer_reviews.title: Size large
customer_reviews.text: I got a large & I’m 6ft 145lbs. It was not that hard to get on like the comments say, only part that was difficult was around the heels/ankles... Fit snug & cant beat the price...
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT an open cell wetsuit , as claimed.
customer_reviews.text: Open cell, by definition, do not have the inside lining. This one does. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Alik Perakh

customer_reviews.title: Open cell suit ..
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me warm in california waters.. I'm 5,10 at 165lbs and got the size large
customer_reviews.author: Eric Eric

product_meta.title: Realon Spearfishing Wetsuit 3mm 5mm Mens Diving Suit 7mm Full Hoodie Camo Scuba Wet Suit
feature_bullets: 5mm CR neoprene open cell Spearfishing Wetsuit
2 pieces set with snap close system
Durable glue and double thread blind stitching
Chest loading pads and knee pads available
